mapper.select: SELECT c.qc_student ,m.mr_name ,SUM(c.qe_score) AS qe_score ,c.qc_date ,(CASE WHEN SUM(c.qe_score) < 60 THEN '초급' WHEN (SUM(c.qe_score) >= 60 AND SUM(c.qe_score) <80) THEN '중급' WHEN (SUM(c.qe_score) >= 80 AND SUM(c.qe_score) <100) THEN '고급' ELSE '판단불가' END) AS scoreClass FROM wt_questions_candidate AS c INNER JOIN wt_questions_enrollment AS e ON c.qe_code = e.qe_code INNER JOIN wt_member_registration AS m on c.qc_student = m.mr_id WHERE c.qc_student = #{questionSid} && e.qt_codename= #{questionCodeName};
